name: Hang Up
description:
Shadow Factory's entry to the 2018 Global Game Jam is now ready to play this Halloween Season.

Players find themselves in a small room with a telephone switchboard.
They must complete the correct cord circuits to connect calls.
In doing so they can listen in on the different conversations and uncover the unsettling secrets that make up a larger mystery.

The virtual reality horror-thriller is playable on the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.
